tool_description: Odds data of Cricket, Football and Tennis and loads more, from US, UK, EU and Aussie bookmakers. Get started for free!  Get live odds data for football, Tennis and Cricket from several US, UK, EU and AU bookmakers. Odds data is for upcoming and live sports games, and updates frequently. Markets include moneyline (head to head), point spreads (points handicap), over/under (totals), & more.  Discover more details on the markets we cover  Get Started for Free  We aim to keep the API as simple as...
